subsc: General transportation sector,Sub-national government administration,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The achievement of project objectives is
            rated as being satisfactory, overall. Sustainability is
            rated as likely. World Bank and Borrower performances are
            each rated satisfactory, overall. Lessons learned focus on
            the following points: 1) Better aligning investment
            operations with the national legal and regulatory framework;
            2) developing adequate capacity and improving coordination
            to minimize the learning curve in implementing parallel
            institutional strengthening programs at the national and
            local levels; 3) ensuring adequate distribution of project
            resources; 4) developing adequate implementation mechanisms
            for multi-municipal projects; and 5) establishing a balance
            between a predefined investment frmaework and local project selection.
